Detailed Description

Generic conductance relation used throughout the HVAC toolkit.

Enforces the product of difference relationship that occurs in heat conduction and elsewhere.

All inverses of the relationship are defined: 

   q = U12*(T1 - T2)

Note:
Used variously whenever quantity is proportional to the difference between two other quantities, such as heat transfer.

Function Documentation

EVALUATE ( cond_U12   ) 

EVALUATE callback for U12.

Returns:
U12 = q/(T1 - T2)

EVALUATE ( cond_T2   ) 

EVALUATE callback for T2.

Returns:
T2 = -q/U12 + T1

EVALUATE ( cond_T1   ) 

EVALUATE callback for T1.

Returns:
T1 = q/U12 + T2

EVALUATE ( cond_q   ) 

EVALUATE callback for q.

Returns:
q = U12*(T1 - T2)
